FuncDef:
The vpls-pruning-mode tm-switch enable command enables switching from NP pruning to TM pruning in VPLS scenarios.
The undo vpls-pruning-mode tm-switch enable command disables switching from NP pruning to TM pruning in VPLS scenarios.
By default, switching from NP pruning to TM pruning is not enabled in VPLS scenarios.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To restore the default pruning mode in which PW traffic is pruned on a TM module in VPLS forwarding, run the vpls-pruning-mode tm-switch enable command to enable switching from NP pruning to TM pruning.
